messages.subject: OH! That's the answer...silly me
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/13/03 10:49:35 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/13/03 10:49:35 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< But, also just like you said of yourself, I dont
throw tantrums like my children. >>

You've thrown several in a very short time, right here on the list.
I've never read a post where you were singled out. Ideas get questioned here
equally.
And yet, anything Sandra says, you seem to take personally.
I got the exact same line of questioning over my beliefs and ideas that you
have, but I don't remember ever feeling "singled out" or acting so incredibly
rude to anyone that questioned my ideas on limits.
I really think there is some negative energy inside that is not allowing
growth or acceptance or at least the ability to not feel attacked.

I really don't think this list is a good fit for you......but maybe I'm wrong.
What do you get from being here?
Is there any learning or advice that doesn't make you angry?
Or is this just negative energy for you. Because if it was just all negative,
I'd find somewhere I felt a positive flow for me.


Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
